config.quickeat.title: QuickEat Settings
config.quickeat.option.sortMode.tooltip: Prioritize by saturation or hunger restoration
config.quickeat.option.eatUntilFull.tool: If enabled, continues eating until hunger bar is full
config.quickeat.option.enableLogs.toolti: Master switch to show/hide messages in action bar
config.quickeat.option.logEat.tooltip: Show message when an item is eaten
config.quickeat.option.logFull.tooltip: Show message when full or stopped
config.quickeat.keybind.title: QuickEat Key
